column5: How much is gas in ontario right now?
Gas is 80 cents Canadian per litre. Been up and down for the last while.
>Gas is 80 cents Canadian per >litre. Been up and down >for the last while. 63.9/litre in west central Aberta, about $1.71/us gallon in us funds.
73 cents per litre. Thats 4.45litres per gallon @ .73= $3.28 at 100 miles north of International Falls. alcy
OK, how many liters in a gallon? The last three posts all have something different, from 2.7 to 3.8 to 4.45.
hope this helps--------to convert liters to gallons multiply by .2642.

if it is .73 Can per liter that is $1.87 US equiv.Exchange rate is 1.48 per US dollar.I've got a spreadsheet set up to do it (I'm lazy)Not much worse than local - Ohio at 1.67 today.Formula is (3.785*price per liter )/exchange rate )
Paul H nailed it on the head,BUT does it really matter when your going on vacation?Enjoy yourself,take the american express or the visa or the Mastercard and fly now,PAY later.
